name: LostSprite
description:
You need light to live. Try to escape before the lantern's spirit goes out. The spirit of the lantern is illuminated only by living things.

KEY GUIDE

  • Playercontrol (Mouse LEFT CLİCK)
  • Interaction Item (E)
  • Change Camera Rotation (A/D)
  • Change Camera Fow (Mouse SCROOL)
  • Settings menu ( ESC)
